Text: April Fool's Day (2008 film):  It is directed by The Butcher Brothers, also known as Mitchell Altieri and Phil Flores, who also directed the vampire film "The Hamiltons".

Text: April Fool's Day (2008 film):  "April Fool's Day" is described by star Scout Taylor-Compton as ""Mean Girls" crossed with horror", and was released straight to DVD on March 25, 2008.
